about_the_game:
Play Solo or Duo !

Ever-Changing Runs

Dive into Umigame's dynamic world, where each playthrough offers a fresh adventure. Navigate ever-changing environments filled with challenging enemies and traps. Strategize with your team to conquer bosses and uncover hidden paths. Remember, the fight isn't over if your teammate falls. As long as the egg stands, there's still a chance.

Battle Together or Solo

Cooperation is key, but the adventure is equally thrilling solo. Team up with friends or go for it alone to test your skills. Learn from each defeat, refine your tactics, and come back stronger. The game continuously ramps up difficulty, pushing you to perfect your strategies.

Evolving Strategies with the Egg

The egg is your evolving lifeline and central mechanic. As you progress, it gains new abilities and strengths, unlocking powerful attacks, providing defenses, and revealing hidden paths. Protect it fiercely, harness its powers, and watch as it grows into an indispensable ally. Bounce it off enemies for massive damage or use it strategically for an advantage. Beware—if the egg loses all its HP, it explodes!

A Captivating Universe

Immerse yourself in Umigame's stunning and sonically captivating universe. Experience art and music enhancing the sense of adventure. Explore serene healing rooms or face the suspense of haunted marshes, promising excitement and a deep connection with its world.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Fight your way out of the Haunted Swamp in this coop roguelite. Protect the Omnicore to dominate the fight. Control deadly turrets, learn new spells and leave your enemies in the mud !
